Item.Name: Nectar
Item.Description: A magical drink consumed by the gods that grants immortality and eternal youth.

Item.Name: Ambrosia
Item.Description: A magical food consumed by the gods that grants immortality and strength.

Item.Name: Body Armor
Item.Description: A lightweight, flexible body armor made of advanced materials such as Kevlar or carbon fiber.
Item.Effect: Provides protection against bullets, projectiles, and supernatural attacks.

Item.Name: Smart-Notebook Device
Item.Description: A notebook with advanced features such as voice recognition and transcription, handwriting recognition, and wireless data transfer.
Item.Effect: Can store and transfer data wirelessly and take pictures of important documents or artifacts.

Item.Name: Silver Ring
Item.Description: A ring with advanced features such as heart rate monitoring, sleep tracking, and activity tracking.
Item.Effect: Has a built-in GPS tracker that can help navigate Olympus, and wearer can monitor their health statistics.

Item.Name: Sig Sauer P226 Pistol
Item.Description: A semi-automatic pistol customized by the Terminus for Laurae Nil.
Item.Effect: Provides a reliable and accurate handgun for Laurae Nil's personal defense.

Item.Name: Tavor X95L DMR
Item.Description: A customized Designated Marksman Rifle (DMR) based on the Tavor X95L platform.
Item.Effect: Provides Laurae Nil with a long-range, accurate rifle for medium to long-range engagements.

Item.Name: Honey Badger SBR
Item.Description: A Personal Defense Weapon (PDW) customized by the Terminus for Laurae Nil.
Item.Effect: Provides Laurae Nil with a compact and lightweight firearm for close-quarters combat situations.

Attachments.Attachment: ACOG Sight, canted Red Dot Sight
